A little preview

My name is Angelo B. Oclinaria and I was born 26 years ago in the beautiful tropical islands of the Philippines. I am now a father to a one year old son and a loving husband to my lovely wife.

Last year was tough for me because I had to teach myself on how to code while I'm working as a Virtual Assistant(Ebay Lister). All I had with me was my passion, patience, and eagerness to learn more about this field of expertise.

I know I still have lot to learn and it was never a hindrance in pursuing this industry.

FOUR CORE COMPOSITION OF MY PERSONALITY

Love

A driving force that sets my path to excel in connecting with others.

Simplicity

Everything in life must be reduced to its singular form - symbolizes peace.

Explore

We live in a world where everything is a mystery. And it is our job to discover every beauty in it.

Hard Work

Persistence. Passion. Patience. Are what makes human spirit unbreakable.
